inspector.description: Visualizing the 'Gamma Casino'. X-Axis: Days to Expiration (DTE). Y-Axis: Moneyness (Greed). Bubble Size: Volume. This chart isolates the 'Chaos' tickers (GME, AMC, IBIT) to show where retail speculation is concentrating.
inspector.sql_logic:
WITH chaos_flow AS (
    SELECT 
        ticker,
        expiration_date,
        strike_price,
        -- DTE: How soon does it expire? (0 = Today)
        DATEDIFF('day', current_date(), expiration_date) as dte,
        
        -- Moneyness: > 1.0 means 'Out of the Money' (Aggressive)
        (strike_price / underlying_price) as moneyness,
        
        -- Volume: The size of the bet
        volume,
        implied_volatility
    FROM int_massive__options_joined
    WHERE 
        ticker IN ('GME', 'AMC', 'IBIT', 'RDDT')
        AND volume > 500 -- Filter noise
        AND dte < 30     -- Focus on short-dated speculation
)

SELECT * FROM chaos_flow ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT 1000;
